summary:
4. Reaffirms all relevant resolutions on Cyprus, particularly resolution 1251 (1999).

5. Extends the mandate of UNFICYP until 15 December 2010 and expresses full support for it.

6. Calls on both sides to engage in consultations with UNFICYP on buffer zone demarcation and the 1989 aide-memoire.

7. Calls on the Turkish Cypriot side and Turkish forces to restore the military status quo in Strovilia.

8. Requests the Secretary-General to report on implementation of this resolution by 1 December 2010.

9. Welcomes efforts to implement the Secretary-General's zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.

10. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
